name: Sleepy Heroes
description:
Use coffee to keep your heroes awake, so that they can defeat the evil dream ghosts!

 Controls: Click hero to wake. Requires coffee! 

 Win: Defeat all enemies. 

 Our Jam themes were: "Synergy" and "Thermodynamics". 

 Synergy is found between characters (characters working together are more powerful than characters awake on their own) 

 The first law of Thermo(s)dynamics is: "Energy cannot be created or destroyed". In Sleepy Heroes, the first law of adventuring is: "Characters cannot be created or destroyed" - so a defeated character respawns on the opposite team.
